text: City Hall–Yongin University Station () is a station of the Everline in Samga- dong, Cheoin-gu, Yongin, South Korea. As its name suggests, Yongin City Hall is in front of the station. ==External links== * Station information from Everline Category:Everline Category:Metro stations in Yongin Category:Railway stations opened in 2013
title: City Hall–Yongin University station
